nl: If $\mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a family of topologies on $X$, show that $\bigcap \mathcal{T}_\alpha$ is a topology on $X$.
lean:
∀ (X I : Type*) (T : I → Set (Set X)) (h : ∀ i, is_topology X (T i)) :
  is_topology X (⋂ i, I, T i)
candidate: ∀ (t : ι → Topology X), IsTopology (⨅ i, t i)
imports:
import Mathlib

open Filter Set TopologicalSpace
open scoped Topology



def is_topology (X : Type*) (T : Set (Set X)) :=
  univ ∈ T ∧
  (∀ s t, s ∈ T → t ∈ T → s ∩ t ∈ T) ∧
  (∀s, (∀t ∈ s, t ∈ T) → sUnion s ∈ T)
